content:
game:
  appid: 331600

installer:

    app: winxp

- task:
    app: devenum
    arch: win32
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: wmp10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- write_file:
    content: '[xboxdrv]

      silent=true

      trigger-as-button=true

      deadzone=4000

      [buttonmap]

      B=Y

      Y=B

      guide=back
